caption.p: Enhancement of precursor treated with biomass accumulation from hairy root culture after 12 weeks. (A) A 4 strain hairy root with 1/2 MS + FDP 3 μM. (B) A 4 strain hairy root with 1/2 MS + FDP 1 μM. (C) R 1000 strain hairy root with 1/2 MS + FDP 3 μM. (D) R 1000 strain hairy root with 1/2 MS + FDP 1 μM.
